original_text: The Lord builds his palace up into heaven, with its foundation on the earth. He takes up the water from the sea, and he pours it out on the earth as rain. The Lord is his name.
korean_text: 그의 궁전을 하늘에 세우시며 그 궁창의 기초를 땅에 두시며 바닷물을 불러 지면에 쏟으시는 이니 그 이름은 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord builds his palace up into heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 그의 궁전을 하늘까지 쌓아 올리시며

sentences.original_text: with its foundation on the earth
He takes up the water from the sea
and he pours it out on the earth as rain
